name: Brows Be Smitten, Heart Be Bitten
simple_desc: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single enemy, dealing 3 hits initially. There is a chance to additionally deal up to 3 hit(s).
desc:
Initially, deals #4[i] hits, each causing Imaginary DMG equal to #1[i]% of March 7th's ATK to a single target enemy. After dealing the final hit, there is a #2[i]% fixed chance to deal 1 extra hit, up to a max of #3[i] extra hit(s). Energy regenerated from using Enhanced Basic ATK does not increase with the number of hits.
Enhanced Basic ATK cannot recover Skill Points.
